You don't need to turn the ingredient approximations into real measurements.
Many podcast episodes contain clues to the country of origin for each recipe.
When putting the podcasts in recording order, assume a month is equivalent to four weeks.

Although reading the podcast transcripts isn't necessary to solve this puzzle (unless you're deaf or hard of hearing), you may find it easier to figure out the extraction if you look at the transcripts.
Each recipe includes only one precise quantity.
